altTitles.ja: コード：ブレイカー

description.en: Sakurakouji Sakura is a girl who appears modest and graceful but in reality is skilled in martial arts. After witnessing a boy burning people with his blue flame, she is startled to see that the same boy is a transfer student, Oogami Rei. Oogami is a Code Breaker, one who "does not exist". He is a seemingly cold-blooded killer who follows the principle of "an eye for an eye", to "use evil against evil". Convinced that killing is not right, Sakurakouji sets out to stop him and penetrate his icy heart.

Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death…
description.pt-br:
Tian Hejin, popularmente conhecido como o Líder da Aliança de Sangue de Ferro, acorda no corpo de “Bi Liduan” – a desgraça de sua família! Seu hobby é apostar, e ele foi trancado em um armazém escuro por muito tempo. Da noite para o dia, Tian Hejin passou de ser o maior especialista de Jianghu para o maior lixo possível.

Vamos começar do zero e realizar tudo o que não pude alcançar em minha vida passada.

title.en: Kanojo ni shitai Joshi Ichii, no Tonari de Mitsuketa Amari-chan

altTitles.ja: 彼女にしたい女子一位、の隣で見つけたあまりちゃん

description.en:
"A Romantic Comedy Starting from Friendship with the Hidden Heroine Only I Know About."

He’s a nice guy, but way too plain… That’s Fukusuke Mogi, who secretly admires Kureha Yui, the most beautiful girl in the class.
However, the one rumored to be with Yui is his best friend, Fujisaki Yusei, the ace of the basketball team.

Feeling down about being a "mob character" overshadowed by his best friend, Fukusuke discovers another super cute girl who’s hidden in Yui’s shadow and doesn’t stand out—Usuba Amari!

"W-Would you… be my friend?"

Sharing similar circumstances, Fukusuke and Amari decide to practice "becoming normal" together—what could possibly happen next?
description.id:
"Kisah Romantis Komedi Dimulai dari Persahabatan dengan Heroine Tersembunyi yang Hanya Aku Tahu."

Dia anak baik, tapi terlalu biasa saja… Itulah Fukusuke Mogi, yang diam-diam mengagumi Kureha Yui, gadis tercantik di kelas.
Namun, orang yang digosipkan bersama Yui adalah sahabatnya, Fujisaki Yusei, bintang tim basket.

Saat merasa terpuruk karena menjadi "karakter figuran" yang tenggelam di balik sahabatnya, Fukusuke menemukan seorang gadis super imut lainnya, yang tersembunyi di balik bayang-bayang Yui dan jarang diperhatikan—Usuba Amari!

"A-Apakah… kamu mau jadi temanku?"

Berbagi nasib yang serupa, Fukusuke dan Amari memutuskan untuk mulai berlatih "menjadi orang biasa" bersama—kira-kira apa yang akan terjadi selanjutnya?
description.es-la:
Fukusuke, un chico agradable pero un poco aburrido, se enamora a primera vista de Yua, la chica más hermosa de la clase. Sin embargo, se rumorea que Yua está interesada en Yusei, el amigo de la infancia de Fukusuke y la estrella del equipo de baloncesto. 

Fukusuke suspira por un amor imposible. Pero, un día, Fukusuke descubre a una chica adorable, llamada Amari Usuha, que es tímida y se esconde tras la sombra de Yua. "Um, ¿quieres ser mi amigo?" Y entonces, los dos empiezan a practicar juntos para "ser normales", pero... "¿Es cierto que Amari-chan está enamorada de Yusei?" "......." "¿Por qué te sonrojas tanto?" 

Una comedia romántica que comienza con amistad, entre un chico aburrido y una chica secretamente adorable, solamente conocida por él. 
(Un pequeño manga para promocionar la novela)
description.pt-br:
Fukusuke, um garoto simpático, mas um pouco chato, se apaixona à primeira vista por Yua, a garota mais linda da turma. No entanto, há rumores de que Yua está interessada em Yusei, amigo de infância de Fukusuke e estrela do time de basquete.

Fukusuke anseia por um amor impossível. Mas, um dia, Fukusuke descobre uma garota adorável, chamada Amari Usuha, que é tímida e se esconde atrás da sombra de Yua. "Hum, você quer ser meu amigo?" E então, os dois começam a praticar juntos para “ser normais”, mas... “É verdade que Amari-chan está apaixonada por Yusei?” "....." "Por que você está corando tanto?"

Uma comédia romântica que começa com uma amizade, entre um garoto chato e uma garota secretamente adorável, que só ele conhece.

altTitles.ja: サーシャちゃんとクラスメイトオタクくん
Саша и ее одноклассник Отаку

altTitles.es-la: La chica de secundaria Sasha-chan y su compañero de clases Otaku-kun

altTitles.vi: Bé sơ trung Sasha và thằng bạn Otaku cùng lớp

description.en:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
description.fr:
Fujiwara est un mangaka amateur, il dessine des mangas érotiques alors qu’il n’est que collégien. Tandis qu'il lisait un porno à l'école, une jolie fille nommée Sasha qui s’avère être très intéressée par ces choses, et lui adresse la parole, elle se met même à l’appeler "Maître" !? 

  C’est l'histoire d'une belle et joyeuse fille qui se porte volontaire pour être mon disciple dans la perversion.
description.ja: 僕は未来の大漫画家にして現えっちな同人誌アシの中学生。学校で同人誌を読んでいたら、えっち方面に興味津々の美少女、サーシャさんから「ししょー」と呼ばれ‥‥!?
description.es-la: Sin importarle el qué dirán y sin temor a caer en lo más bajo de la escala social dentro de la escuela, Otaku-kun no oculta su gran afición por los mangas para adultos, cosa que le hace ganarse el rechazo de su salón apenas en el primer día de clases; sin embargo, Sasha, lejos de sentir aberración por su afición, muestra un interés peculiar, iniciando así una relación... ¡¿mentor-alumna?!

altTitles.ja: 寄生列島

description.en: Sendo Chihiro, a high school girl, moves from Tokyo to the provincial island of Hanayama after her parents' divorce. There's something strange about the island she moves to. There is blatant discrimination against outsiders, mysterious rituals that suddenly take place, and a huge "water tower" built in the middle of the island... One day, a fisherman is stabbed to death in his home. The whole island becomes suspicious of the murderer, and the unexpected culprit is revealed...
description.ja: 離島「花山島」に東京からやってきた女子高生、千堂千尋。独自の風俗が残るその島で、人の欲望が暴走する事件が起き始める。殺人、放火、強姦…‥際限ない欲望が離島を地獄に変えていく――。

altTitles.ja: カワイイなんて聞いてない！！

altTitles.zh: 我才没听说过他这么可爱！！

altTitles.vi: Tôi chưa từng biết rằng cậu ấy lại dễ thương tới vậy

description.en:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
description.fr:
Madoka est obsédée par les mangas shoujo, en particulier ceux mettant en scène de jeunes hommes innocents tombant amoureux de leur Senpai. Elle devrait être ravie lorsqu'un magnifique kohai commence à travailler dans le restaurant de son père, sauf qu'il est impoli et distant, ne voulant rien avoir à faire avec elle. Cependant, quand elle le protège contre des fans trop insistants, il réalise qu'il a peut-être trouvé quelqu'un capable de faire tomber ses barrières...!

---
Madoka est une lycéenne qui adore les jeunes garçons mignons. Un jour, Shikura arrive comme employé à temps partiel dans le diner de ses parents ! Shikura est beau et séduisant, mais il n'est pas très gentil ?! Elle pensait ne jamais l'apprécier, mais la façon dont il regarde parfois est douloureusement mignonne ! Comment ne pourrait-elle pas vraiment l'aimer ?!

altTitles.en: Payback to those that bullied me. This is the revenge of 31.

altTitles.ja: イジメカエシ。－復讐の３１-

description.en:
I was bullied by everyone, so in return I'm going to slaughter them all.  
Taking inspiration from the 31 days of the calendar, the uber popular girl group Calendrier was formed. Behind the bubbly appearance, in the shadows, there is one member that is bullied by the others on a daily basis. "If you can't smile, then neither will the fans."  
She is willing to do anything to regain the smile that was robbed by her group mates.  
  
With 30 members as her opponents, this is the story of the crazy number 31.

altTitles.ja: いとこのこ

description.en:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
description.ja:
友達以上恋人未満な従妹が距離が近すぎて死ぬほど可愛い!!!!?

夏休みの間、叔父の家で過ごすことになった少年・望。山と田んぼが多い田舎で困惑するも、それ以上彼にはある悩みがあった。その原因は「従妹」の爽!! 褐色元気っ娘の彼女に毎回からかわれては年上の威厳を見せられないでいた！ しかも、天然なのか意図的なのか分からない爽の誘ってくるような仕草にドキッとする始末。いつしか、望は彼女のことが目を離せず……!!? こんな「従妹」がいてくれたら理性が持たない!?
description.pt-br:
Seu primo mais que amigo, menos que amante é tão fofo que poderia morrer!!!!?

Nozomu é um garoto que está na casa do tio nas férias de verão. No campo, onde não há lojas de conveniência, nem mesmo ônibus, o garoto tem um problema. Esse problema é seu primo mais novo, Sou! Ele está sendo levado por essa garota bronzeada e cheia de energia dia após dia e não consegue mostrar a ela a dignidade condizente com sua idade avançada!

Além disso, intencionalmente ou não, ele está ficando nervoso com o comportamento convidativo de Sou. Eventualmente, Nozomu não conseguia tirar os olhos de Sou e estava caindo cada vez mais sob seu feitiço...!!? Com ​​uma "prima" como essa, sua razão está tendo dificuldade em se segurar!

Esta é uma comédia romântica com um cara que está afundando com todas as provocações de sua prima bronzeada!

altTitles.ja: 奇縁 〜 ゲームと現実がリンクする

altTitles.en: My Lucky Encounter From the Game Turned Into Reality

description.en:
"Who says revenge is vain? It's so fun!"

In a world where magic co-exists with the rule of nobles, Adrian Lawrence seemed to have gotten lucky in life as the second son of a viscount. Despite this, Adrian is an outcast in a home controlled by his scheming step-mother and half-brother, who are set on ousting him. 

Little do they know that Adrian plays the game Chronicle Online, where he possesses great powers that can also be used in reality! 

With heirship to the viscounty up for grabs, can Adrian use his powers to level up his real life?

title.en: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ja: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく！外伝　廣井きくりの深酒日記

altTitles.en: Bocchi the Rock! Side Story: Hiroi Kikuri's Heavy Drinking Diary

altTitles.ru: Одинокий Рокер! Спин-офф: Дневник пьяницы Хирои Кикури

altTitles.vi: Bocchi the Rock! Ngoại Truyện: Nhật Ký Say Rượu của Hiroi Kikuri

altTitles.ja-ro: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden: Hiroi Kikuri no Fukazake Nikki

description.en:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

description.en: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.

altTitles.zh-ro: You Bei Houbei Xia Ke Shang
Yòu Bèi Hòubèi Xià Kè Shàng

altTitles.en: I've Been Defeated by The Younger Generation Again
I Was Beaten Down By The Younger Generation Again

description.en: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
description.zh: 被下属称呼为“眼镜蛇”的美术组长吕美合是个外表严苛内心纯情的人。她暗恋组内实习生林文静，然而碍于形象和人设，无法自然地表达自己的情谊，只能将自己的情感寄托于随身携带的素描本。 一次意外，素描本的秘密被当事人发现，吕美合才知道，看似温柔随性的林文静，似乎人后性格不文静啊…… 今天又被后辈欺负了，太幸福了，怎么办？

altTitles.th: สลับร่างล้างอธรรม (II)

altTitles.ja: 鉄腕バーディー (II)

description.en:
A remake of Birdy the Mighty.  
  
Birdy Cephon Altera is a Federation agent chasing interplanetary criminals to the planet Earth. While in pursuit of one such criminal, she accidentally kills a high school boy named Tsutomu Senkawa. Fortunately for Tsutomu, there is a way to keep him alive. He ends up being merged into Birdy's body and must remain so until the repair of his body is complete.  
  
So, Tsutomu is stuck sharing a body with an attractive, strong, and impulsive space police agent while trying to keep his family and friends from finding out about Birdy. In the meantime, Birdy continues her investigation. Together, they take on a secretive group of evil aliens planning to perform experiments on the unsuspecting inhabitants of Earth.  
  
[<https://books.google.co.uk/books/about/%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%A3%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%AD.html?id=gIqrDwAAQBAJ&redir_esc=y>] Official Thai   
  
"The original manga ran in what is now Monthly Sunday, but when Masami Yuki began serializing Kyuukyoku Choujin R in the pages of Shonen Sunday it began appearing infrequently, and was eventually abandoned. Only one volume was ever collected. In 2003 Masami Yuki moved from Shonen Sunday to Weekly Young Sunday, a seinen magazine, and began drawing a remake version, starting the story from the beginning." –Wikipedia  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4980) (OAV)

altTitles.ja: 時先生は着替えたい

altTitles.en: Ms. Toki Wants to Change Clothes
Ms. Toki wants to change clothes.

description.en:
Meet Shisoya Toki, a quiet female teacher with a thing for “clothes”. Often seen as cold and unfriendly, her students call her the “unfortunate beautiful teacher”. 

But one day, while organizing supplies in the old school building, she finds a brand new pair of bloomers. Suddenly, her kinky curiosity about “clothes” goes wild!! 

Sometimes SEXY! Sometimes CUTE! Get ready for a wild ride full of seductive cosplay!!
description.ja: “服“が趣味の寡黙な女教師・四十八時（しそやとき）。冷たい・不愛想と思われがちな彼女は、生徒から「残念美人教師」と呼ばれてしまう…。しかしある日の放課後、備品整理のため向かった旧校舎で、新品のブルマーを発見した時先生は、“服”への痴的好奇心が爆発し…！！時にSEXY！時にKAWAII！魅惑満載コスプレ・エロス！！
description.es-la: Conoce a Shisoya Toki, una profesora tranquila a la que le gusta la "ropa". A menudo vista como fría y antipática, sus alumnos la llaman la "desafortunada y hermosa maestra". Pero un día, mientras organiza los suministros en el antiguo edificio de la escuela, encuentra un nuevo par de bloomers. ¡De repente, su curiosidad pervertida por la "ropa" se vuelve loca! A veces SEXY, a veces LINDO.¡prepárate para un viaje salvaje lleno de cosplay seductor!

description.en:
Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
description.ko:
장원에 급제하여 입궁한 학사 운현.
황태자의 취미생활을 전담하는 초라하고 처량한 신세를 한탄하지만,
그럼에도 포기하지 않고 최선을 다해 무공을 익힌다.
그러던 운현은 갑자기 무림을 제패하기 위해 붓을 드는데?!

젊은 나이에 장원에 급제한 학사의 숨겨진 이야기가 시작된다.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
description.pt-br: O Escolar Woon Hyun entra no palácio depois de passar no Exame Imperial. Embora ele logo venha a lamentar sua vida pobre e miserável de ter que lidar com os hobbies do príncipe herdeiro, ele não desiste e dá o seu melhor para aprender artes marciais. Mas Woon Hyun de repente pega seu pincel para conquistar o Murim?! A história oculta do estudioso que passou no Exame Imperial ainda jovem começa.

title.en: Breaking Into the Body of the Emperor's Daughter

description.en:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...

title.en: Hell Mode ~Yarikomi Suki no Gamer wa Hai Settei no Isekai de Musou Suru~

altTitles.en: Hell Mode: The Hardcore Gamer Dominates in Another World with Garbage Balancing

altTitles.ja: ヘルモード ～やり込み好きのゲーマーは廃設定の異世界で無双する～ はじまりの召喚士

description.en:
Yamada Kenichi, a single, 35-year-old businessman, has spent the majority of his adult life playing every MMORPG to hit the market. Tired of the constant cycle of repetitive, newbie-centric gameplay, he is immediately drawn in by the promise of a new game that, on top of being never-ending, offers up a "Hell Mode" — a difficulty level that makes it nigh impossible to level up but also promises uncapped growth potential.

Upon selecting the newly released Summoner class, Kenichi finds himself reborn as Allen, an infant in a serf family, with nothing but his wits and old memories to guide him. Allen works diligently to level himself up despite Hell Mode requiring vast amounts of experience between levels. In doing so, he hopes to uncover the secrets the Summoner class holds. All the while, he dedicates himself to freeing his new family from serfdom.
description.ja: 「終わらないゲームにあなたを招待します。 だって?」 健一が偶然たどり着いたタイトルのない謎のネットゲーム。 難易度設定画面で迷わず最高難易度『ヘルモード』を選ぶと、異世界の農奴へと転生してしまった! 少年「アレン」へと転生した健一は、謎の多い職業「召喚士」を使いこなしながら、 異世界で最強への道を手探りで歩み始めるが――。
description.pt-br: "Você será convocado para o mundo de um jogo sem fim?' Um dia, estava procurando um novo jogo, quando de repente vi aquele anúncio. Depois de escolher o modo mais difícil do jogo, 'modo inferno', de repente reencarnei em um novo mundo como um lavrador. Como um menino chamado Allen, comecei minha jornada em outro mundo com a maior dificuldade, superando todos os desafios para alcançar o maior título do jogo "Summoner" . ----- O romance promissor de 1º grau da revista 'Vamos nos tornar um escritor ', uma história extremamente aguardada.

title.en: Shijou Saikyou no Mahou Kenshi, F Rank Boukensha ni Tensei Suru ~Kensei to Matei, 2 Tsu no Zense o motta Otoko no Eiyuutan~

altTitles.en: The Strongest Magical Swordsman Ever Reborn as an F-Rank Adventurer

altTitles.ja: 史上最強の魔法剣士、Fランク冒険者に転生する　～剣聖と魔帝、2つの前世を持った男の英雄譚～

altTitles.zh: 最强之人转生成F级冒险者

altTitles.ko: 사상 최강의 마법검사, F랭크 모험자로 전생한다~검성과 마제, 2개의 전생을 가진 남자들의 영웅담~

description.en: Yuri was the hero who saved the world, being called "Demon Emperor" in his first reincarnation and "Sword Saint" in his second reincarnation. However, before he knew it, he was considered a "monster" and was shunned by people. Yuri finally gets fed up and decides to live 100% for himself next time. He reincarnates into the future and is immediately attacked by monsters. As he defends himself, Yuri acquires the skills of his previous lives and quickly annihilates his enemies. Eventually, Yuri arrives at the adventurers guild and decides to start his life as an F-rank novice adventurer while hiding his true strength.
description.id: Aizawa Yuri telah bereinkarnasi sebanyak 2x dan ia telah lelah menjadi penguasa ini dan itu. Dengan skill miliknya memungkinkan ia mendapatkan artefak reinkarnasi, dan ia memulai kesehariannya di dunia barunya!
description.ja: 一度目の転生では《魔帝》、二度目の転生では《剣聖》と呼ばれ、世界を救った勇者ユーリ。しかし、いつしか《化物》と人々に疎まれる存在になっていた。ついに嫌気が差したユーリは、次こそ100%自分のために生きると決意。未来の世界に再び転生する。その転生直後から襲い来るモンスターたち。咄嗟に対応するうちに、ユーリは次々と前世・前前世のスキルを取得し、あっという間に敵を殲滅していく。やがてギルドにたどり着いたユーリは、《魔帝》と《剣聖》の最強の力を秘めながら、Fランクの駆け出し冒険者として生活を始めることにするのだった――。

title.en: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou ni Natte-Node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai-Musume to Hono-bono suru

altTitles.ru: Я стал Повелителем Демонов и создал подземелье, чтобы проводить время с девушками-монстрами

altTitles.ja: 魔王になったので、ダンジョン造って人外娘とほのぼのする

altTitles.zh: 魔王建造地下城转生到异世界建造人外娘

altTitles.ko: 마왕이 됐으므로 던전을 만들고 인외아가씨와 훈훈해진다

altTitles.ja-ro: Maō ni Nattanode, Dungeon Zōtte Jingaimusume to Honobono suru

altTitles.zh-hk: 魔王建造地下城轉生到異世界建造人外娘

altTitles.en: Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon
I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls

altTitles.ja-ro: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru

altTitles.vi: Sau Khi Tôi Là 1 Ma Vương, Tôi Sẽ Xây Dựng Hầm Ngục Cùng Với Các Nô Lệ!

description.en:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
description.ja: 異世界転生したユキは、気付くとダンジョンの魔王になっていた!? チートな強さで人外娘達を助けたり、超便利なカタログ通販（？）でダンジョンに凶悪な罠を仕掛けたりとやりたい放題。自由と平和を守るため、快適＆最凶ダンジョン造りを目指せ！ 人気WEB小説コミカライズ!!
description.vi: Trước khi nhận ra, tôi đã trở thành người bảo vệ của một ngục tối, một Chúa Quỷ. Tôi bỗng nhiên bị cuốn vào một thế giới nguy hiểm với những con quái vật khổng lồ lang thang quanh đó, chiến đấu để tồn tại. Vì vậy, tôi quyết định phát triển ngục tối để không bị chết, nhưng không hiểu sao tôi lại cảm thấy khá thích thú với việc này... Làm sao mà lại trở thành như vậy? Nhân vật chính, Yuki, buộc phải sống trong thế giới này, sử dụng khả năng nhạy bén và tinh tế của mình, cùng thời gian bên một cô gái rồng tối thượng và một cô gái ma cà rồng, đôi khi cười, đôi khi tức giận, trải qua những ngày tháng làm những gì mình thích
description.es-la: Antes de darme cuenta, me había convertido en el guardián de una mazmorra, un Señor Demonio. De repente, estaba en un mundo peligroso con monstruos gigantes holgazaneando, luchando por la existencia de la mazmorra para no morir, pero por alguna razón estaba pasando un buen momento ... ¿Cómo resultó esto? El protagonista, Yuki, usa sus sentidos audaces y agudos y pasa el tiempo con una niña dragón suprema y una niña vampiro; A veces riendo, a veces enojándose, pasando días haciendo lo que le gusta.
description.pt-br:
Antes que eu percebesse, eu havia me tornado o guardião de uma masmorra, um Lorde Demônio.  De repente, eu estava em um mundo perigoso com monstros gigantes vagando por aí, lutando por sua existência, então pensei em desenvolver a masmorra para não morrer, mas – por algum motivo eu estava me divertindo bastante….  Como ficou assim?

 O protagonista, Yuki, tendo que viver naquele mundo agora, usa seus sentidos ousados ​​e afiados e passa o tempo com uma suprema garota dragão e uma garota vampira;  Às vezes rindo, às vezes com raiva, passando dias fazendo o que gosta.

altTitles.ja: 無限レベルアップin武林

description.en:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ja:
ここは努力したぶん強くなれる世界

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ko:
재능도 없고 출신도 비천했던 하급무사 단유성, 전쟁터에서 죽다.
하지만 저승인 줄 알고 눈을 떴더니, 어린 시절의 과거로 돌아와 있지 않은가?
이상한 숫자와 문자가 눈 앞에 보이고, 그 지시를 따르면 노력한 만큼 보상을 받기까지 한다.
노력한 만큼의 보상을 받는 세상. 무한레벨업 in 무림에 오신것을 환영합니다.

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.ru:
Тан Ю Сон, младший воин, не имевший таланта, с низким уровнем подготовки, погиб на поле боя.

Но когда он открыл глаза, он был сильно удивлён! Он вернулся в свое прошлое, когда ещё был ребёнком! Теперь он может изменить будущее!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
description.pt-br: Morto no campo de batalha sem glória para seu nome, Yuseong Dan recebe a oportunidade de ficar mais forte com uma estranha missão e sistema de níveis. Mas cada missão que ele é forçado a lutar parece estar ficando cada vez mais difícil. Ele pode subir de nível o suficiente para evitar o mesmo final miserável e se tornar o herói poderoso que deseja ser?

title.en: Shokubutsu Mahou Chito de Nonbiri Ryoshu Seikatsu Hajimemasu Zense no Chishiki o Kushi Shite Nogyo Shitara, Gyakuten Jinsei Hajimatta Kudan

altTitles.en: Use Cheat Plant Magic and Live Comfortably as a Lord!

altTitles.ja: 植物魔法チートでのんびり領主生活始めます　前世の知識を駆使して農業したら、逆転人生始まった件

altTitles.zh: 用植物魔法开挂过上悠闲领主生活

altTitles.ja-ro: Shokubutsu Mahou Cheat de Nonbiri Ryoushu Seikatsu Hajime Masu Zense No Chishiki wa Kushi Shite Nougyou Shi Tara 、 Gyakuten Jinsei Hajimatsu ta Ken
Shokubutsu Mahō Chīto de Nonbiri RyōShu Seikatsu Hajimemasu Zense No Chishiki o Kushi Shite Nōgyō Shitara, Gyakuten Jinsei Hajimatta Kudan

altTitles.zh-hk: 用植物魔法開掛過上悠閒領主生活

description.en: The boy Elt, who reincarnated as an aristocrat, was branded as incompetent and was thrown out as a manager of a remote area with zero territories. However, his "plant magic" was the best all-purpose magic for territorial development! As he cultivated by utilizing the magic that produces from crops to buildings and the knowledge of the previous life , the number of territories increased and became lively. Moreover, the territory that should have nothing is actually a treasure trove.
description.ja: 貴族に転生した少年エルトは戦闘に向かない植物魔法の才能により冷遇され、僻地の管理者として放りだされてしまう。だが彼の能力は、土地開拓には最適の万能魔法だった！

altTitles.en: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon

description.en:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
description.fr:
Était-ce un ange, un démon ou autre chose qui m'a ressuscité ?
Jisoo Han, un major de troisième année en chirurgie générale, a perdu la vie en raison de sa personnalité droite. Cependant, grâce aux bonnes actions qu'il a faites dans sa vie, il a été ressuscité dans le corps d'un homme mort qui a été tué par des bandits de montagne. Mais ce corps… Est-ce le corps d'un grand chirurgien légendaire ?! Maintenant, dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes de guerres et de héros [CE 200]. Jisoo essaie de survivre et de se tenir debout en tant que chirurgien légendaire ……
Le voyage inattendu et extraordinaire d'un jeune chirurgien, tombé dans l'ère des Trois Royaumes, a commencé !
description.ko:
정의로운 성격 때문에 전문의는 커녕, 목숨까지 잃은 일반외과 전공 3년차 한진수.

천사인가, 악마인가, 아님 알 수 없는 시스템인가.
평소 쌓은 선행 덕분에 부활의 기회를 얻게 된다.

산적 떼에게 죽은 몸으로 부활하게 된 한진수.
그런데 이 몸이 전설의 명의名醫 화타?!

전란이 끊임없는 영웅들의 시대, 혼란한 후한 말.
한진수, 그는 후한 말 명의名醫 화타로서 우뚝 서려 한다…….

<삼국지연의> 속 세상에 떨어진 젊은 외과의사가 펼치는 
기상천외한 모험이 시작된다!"

title.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Side Story - Missing Link

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden - MISSING LINK

altTitles.en: Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden - Missing Link

altTitles.ja: 機動戦士ガンダム外伝 ミッシングリンク

altTitles.ja-ro: Kidou Senshi Gundam Gaiden - Missing Link

description.en:
In the midst of the Universal Century’s raging One Year War, there is a shadowy unit that purges the Federation of wrongdoers! 

The long-awaited first volume of the manga adaptation of the Mobile Suit Gundam Gaiden Missing Link from the popular game "Mobile Suit Gundam Side Stories" by Namco Bandai Games!

altTitles.ja: 放課後コネクション

description.en: A young boy in a local village tries to look for Matsutake mushrooms after some time has passed due to failure on finding any mushrooms.

altTitles.ja: 東京エイリアンズ

description.en: Gunji Akira, who has just started high school, has been chasing after his father's ghost by trying to become a police officer just like him. One day however, he has a surprise encounter with an alien while leaving school. And there begins the start of his fateful adventures with extraterrestrial life…
description.vi: Một ngày đẹp trời, Gunji Akira, một học sinh trung học bình thường đã đặt chân lên toa tàu định mệnh; và từ đó, cuộc đời cậu đã thay đổi hoàn toàn. Câu chuyện gay lọ à nhầm gay cấn đã bắt đầu~

altTitles.ja: ちるらん 新撰組鎮魂歌【レクイエム】

description.en: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
description.pt-br: Em 1912, uma jovem mulher rastreia o idoso Nagakura Shinpachi, determinada a ouvir a verdadeira história do Demônio do Shinsengumi, o Vice-Comandante Hijikata Toshizou. A história de Hijikata começa em 1859, quando ele é um jovem violento que está aprimorando suas habilidades com a espada enquanto vende os remédios de sua família. Logo, em sua busca para encontrar pessoas mais fortes para lutar, Hijikata começa a entrar em contato com outros que eventualmente se tornarão seus companheiros no Shinsengumi. O primeiro a causar uma impressão no jovem impetuoso é Kondo Isami, que prova ser um lutador melhor do que Hijikata.

description.en:
Science or magic?

 « Welcome to Paris, elected for the 68th month in a row as the least polluted city in the world. Thanks to cyanel, the air we breathe inside our houses is purified. » 

In a futuristic Paris, pollution is so prevalent that all greenery has disappeared. Recently, a gigantic plant appeared in the heart of the city, and the authorities are making sure no one gets close… Thomas, a young science student, is secretly studying the phenomenon, hoping for a better life.

Raised by his witchcraft-loving grand-mother, he is often prone to hallucinations. One day, he crosses paths with a strange young girl with very bright eyes, who faints in the air. From then on, his fate changes…
description.fr:
Science ou magie ?

« Bienvenue à Paris, élue pour le 68e mois consécutif : Ville la moins polluée du monde. C’est grâce au cyanel que nous pouvons respirer un air purifié à l’intérieur de nos maisons. »

Dans un Paris futuriste, la pollution est tellement présente que toute végétation a disparu. Depuis peu, une plante gigantesque a fait son apparition au cœur de la ville, et les autorités veillent à ce que la population ne s’en approche pas… Thomas, un jeune étudiant scientiste, se livre secrètement à l’étude de ce phénomène, peut-être un espoir pour une vie meilleure.

Élevé par sa grand-mère passionnée de sorcellerie, il est souvent victime d’hallucinations. Un jour, il croise une étrange jeune fille aux yeux très clairs qui s’évanouit dans les airs. Dès lors, son destin va basculer….

title.en: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita

altTitles.ja: 今さらですが、幼なじみを好きになってしまいました

altTitles.vi: Có chút muộn màng nhưng tôi đã phải lòng người bạn thuở nhỏ của mình

altTitles.ja-ro: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi o Suki ni Natteshimaimashita

altTitles.es-la: Es algo tarde, pero me he enamorado de mi amigo de la infancia

altTitles.en: It's a Little Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.pl: Nieco Późno, ale Zakochałam się w Moim Przyjacielu z Dzieciństwa

altTitles.en: It's Quite Late, but I've Fallen in Love with My Childhood Friend

altTitles.ja: さらなみ

altTitles.ru: Слишком поздно я влюбилась в друга детства

description.en:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
description.pl: Mangowa adaptacja powieści napisanej przez Maruto Fumiaki. Twórcą tej adaptacji jest Yom, mangaka z Ganbare, Douki-chan.

altTitles.ja: けいおん！Shuffle
けいおん！シャッフル

description.en: Sakuma Yukari decided to start a band on her own after seeing a certain band during the Sakura High School festival, then with her best friend Shimizu Kaede, they want to join the Light Music Club only to discover that in their school there isn't a club like that. With help from Sawabe Maho, they discover there is a Light Music Appreciation Society with only one member, Satou Riko.
description.pt-br: Sakuma Yukari decidiu começar uma banda sozinha depois de ver uma certa banda durante o festival Sakura High School, então com sua melhor amiga Shimizu Kaede, eles querem se juntar ao Clube De Músicas Leves apenas para descobrir que em sua escola não há um clube assim. Com a ajuda de Sawabe Maho, eles descobrem que existe uma Sociedade de Apreciação de Música Leve com apenas um membro, Satou Riko.

title.en: The Gardener in a Hunter World

description.en:
Ji-ha, the weakest labor-class hunter with neither skill nor fighting ability, made a living by running a store while holding the lowest hunter rank.

But one day, his life as a hunter changed when he entered a garden from a different dimension through his dream...

<You have obtained Friendly Plant Lv.1> <You have obtained Blessing of XXX Lv.1>

'I gained a skill just by planting one twig...?'

His unique adventure as the sole gardener in the hunter world begins.

This series is adapted from a novel on the zhulang site. 

Lin Qinghan’s grandfather (her father’s father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of “Satan” among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.

altTitles.ja: お兄ちゃんはおしまい!

description.en:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/0e9KPgq.png) [Official Melon Books](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/circle/index.php?circle_id=3753)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/t9hf4kQ.png) [Official Toranoana](https://ec.toranoana.shop/tora/ec/cot/circle/2UPA116P847KdC6Rd687/all/)  
![](https://i.imgur.com/lGJEbPa.png) [Official DLSite](https://www.dlsite.com/home/circle/profile/=/maker_id/RG40614.html) (jp)
description.pt-br: Oyama Mahiro, um dia acordou como uma garota graças a sua irmã que colocou uma droga em sua comida, após ter visto eroges a noite toda. Um mangá de comédia sobre um garoto que se transformou em uma mulher.

altTitles.th: เด็กพันธุ์นรกสั่งลุย

altTitles.ja: べるぜバブ

description.en:
Ishiyama High is a school populated entirely by delinquents, where nonstop violence and lawlessness are the norm. However, there is one universally acknowledged rule—don't cross first year student Tatsumi Oga, Ishiyama's most vicious fighter.  
  
One day, Oga is by a riverbed when he encounters a man floating down the river. After being retrieved by Oga, the man splits down the middle to reveal a baby, which crawls onto Oga's back and immediately forms an attachment to him. Though he doesn't know it yet, this baby is named Kaiser de Emperana Beelzebub IV, or "Baby Beel" for short—the son of the Demon Lord!  
  
As if finding the future Lord of the Underworld isn't enough, Oga is also confronted by Hildegard, Beel's demon maid who insists he take responsibility as Beel's guardian. Together they attempt to raise Baby Beel—although surrounded by juvenile delinquents and demonic powers, the two of them may be in for more of a challenge than they can imagine.  


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **Beelzebub** (2013)
description.ru:
Сильный хулиган Ога Тацуми, по прозвищу Лютый Ога, Демон или «Чтоб он сдох!» находит ребенка, который оказывается сыном Короля Демонов! Он избранный воспитать ребенка, пока тот не дорастет до того когда будет способен уничтожить мир, вместе с демоном-нянькой Хильдой. Они точно уморят мир …смехом!  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=11858) (anime)
description.uk:
У школі "Ішіяма" панує хаос серед учнів-правопорушників, у коридорах панують насильство та беззаконня. Але серед цього безладу одне правило стоїть понад усе: ніколи не переходити дорогу першокурснику Тацумі Озі, найзапеклішому бійцю школи.
Одного доленосного дня Ога натрапляє на таємничого чоловіка, що пливе річкою. На його подив, чоловік розкривається, відкриваючи немовля, яке одразу ж чіпляється до Оги. Він не знає, що це немовля - Кайзер Де Імперана Вельзевул IV, спадкоємець Повелителя Демонів, також відомий як "Малюк Вельзик".
Вимушено взявши на себе роль опікуна, Ога опиняється у світі демонічних сил і підліткової злочинності. З появою Хільдегарди, демонічної покоївки Вельзика, Ога мусить долати труднощі виховання Вельзика, водночас борючись за власну репутацію найсильнішого в Ішіямі.
Коли Ога та Вельзевул разом проходять через випробування шкільного життя, вони дізнаються, що справжнім випробуванням є їхній неймовірний зв'язок на тлі хаосу та надприродних сил.

title.en: Peaceful Camping Life in Another World

altTitles.es-la: Acampando en otro Mundo: buscandole el sazon a la vida

altTitles.en: Healing Life Through Camping In Another World

description.en: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?

The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
description.ko:
퇴마사가 귀신인 나에게 반해버렸다...?! 
퇴마사로부터 살아남기 위해 거짓 고백을 해버린 한 귀신의 생존 서바이벌 연애기
description.ru: Вы бы признались кому-то в любви, если бы это означало спасение вашей жизни? Ну, это то, что я сделал. Я призрак по имени Умин, а моя девушка - охотница за привидениями. Довольно банально, я знаю... Честно говоря, я не знаю, как мне избавиться от нее, но я не могу позволить ей просто убить меня!

description.en:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?

altTitles.en: The Poem of the Wind and the Trees
The Song of Wind and Trees

altTitles.ja: 風と木の詩

altTitles.it: Il Poema del Vento e degli Alberi

description.en:
It is 1880 at the all-boys school, Lacombrade Academy in France. Serge Battour is a cheerful and kind new student who is trying to fit in with the rest of the student body, despite the taboo of his gypsy heritage, made obvious by his dark skin. However, his roommate Gilbert Cocteau, known for sleeping with anyone at the school to manipulate them to his advantage, is not helping the situation, especially when he makes it his personal goal to bring about Serge's downfall.   
  
Originally published in the 1970's, Kaze to Ki no Uta is considered by many to be the first true yaoi manga. In 1979, this series was awarded the prestigious Shogakukan Manga Award for shounen/shoujo manga.  
  
A bit of warning: "Kaze…" includes scenes of rape and child abuse (including lots of shota).

Rosaline believed that she and Romeo were destined to be lovers, but an unexpected tragedy comes when he dies on the same day as her cousin, Juliet. Rosaline learns she has one last memory of Romeo— a son. However, Rosaline’s loving memory of Romeo is shattered when she learns of his betrayal. With no one left to love and protect but her son, the last thing she wants is for Romeo to return to Verona and take everything she holds dear.
description.uk: Розалін вірила, що їй і Ромео судилося бути коханцями. Але несподівана трагедія сталася, коли він помер у той самий день, що й її двоюрідна сестра Джульєтта. Розалін дізнається, що у неї залишився останній спогад про Ромео — син. Однак любовна пам’ять Розаліни про Ромео руйнується, коли вона дізнається про його зраду. Оскільки не залишилося нікого, кого можна любити й захищати, окрім її сина, останнє, чого вона хоче, це щоб Ромео повернувся до Верони й забрав усе, що їй дорого.

altTitles.ja: 時森さんが無防備です!!

altTitles.th: คุณโทคิโมริไม่ระวังตัวเลยครับ!!

description.en: Tokimori-san is a beautiful and successful woman. But when she's off the job, she tends to be a bit absent-minded! Living together with the charming Tokimori-san always makes me nervous!
description.ja: 美人で仕事がデキる時森さん。でもオフのときは、ちょっとみだれがちで！？艶かしい時森さんとの同居生活に、僕はいつもドキドキさせられる—！！
description.pt-br: Tokimori-san é uma mulher linda e bem-sucedida. Mas quando ela está fora do trabalho, ela tende a ficar um pouco distraída! Viver junto com a charmosa Tokimori-san sempre me deixa nervoso!

title.en: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather

altTitles.pt-br: Me apaixonei pelo avô do meu ex-noivo

altTitles.en: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather

description.en: After getting rejected by her fiancé, 20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.
description.pt-br: Depois de ser rejeitada pelo noivo, Mary Menoushire, de 20 anos, desmaiou de choque. Ela então foi possuída por uma senhora de 50 anos de outro mundo... que acha que o avô do seu (ex) noivo é mais gostoso.

altTitles.ja: ウマ娘シンデレラグレイ

description.en: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
description.ja: 寂れたカサマツの地に現れた、ひとりの灰被りの少女。後に“怪物”と呼ばれるその少女は、どこを目指して疾るのか――。地方から中央の伝説へ。
description.vi: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray là một manga spin-off của series Uma Musume. Câu chuyện kể về Oguri Cap và cuộc hành trình trở thành một Mã Nương huyền thoại của cô.

altTitles.ja: アイドル辞めるけど結婚してくれますか!?

altTitles.en: Will You Marry Me Because I Quit Being an Idol?

altTitles.pt-br: Estou deixando de ser uma Idol, mas você se casaria comigo!?

altTitles.ja-ro: Idol Yameru kedo Kekkon Shite Kuremasu ka!?

altTitles.vi: Anh Sẽ Kết Hôn Với Em Nếu Em Từ Bỏ Việc Trở Thành Thần Tượng Chứ?

description.en:
Sato Itto, an ordinary salaryman, has been shy about love due to an old trauma. Then one day, a reunion is held for the first time in several years. While they are having a good time talking about the good old days, suddenly Hebo, who has become an idol currently on hiatus, decides to attend the reunion!

Sato is upset to see Hebo, who was his first love. He manages to get over it with the help of alcohol, which he does not normally drink. When he wakes up, he finds the two of them naked in the same bed. As Sato desperately tries to recall his memories, Hebo shockingly says to him...!

"Marry me..."

What will happen to the marriage between the two who have no experience with love...!?
description.ja:
いたって普通のサラリーマンの佐藤一途（さとういっと）は昔のトラウマで恋に奥手になっていた。そんなある日、数年ぶりに同窓会が開かれることに。昔話に花を咲かせていると、急にアイドル休止ほやほやの枦保（へぼ）さんが出席することに!? 初恋の人だった枦保さんを前に動揺する佐藤。普段の飲まないお酒の力を借りてなんとか乗り切るも目を覚ますと同じベッドに裸の二人。必死に記憶を思い出そうとする佐藤に枦保さんから衝撃の一言が…！

「結婚して…」

恋愛偏差値0同士の結婚の行方は果たして―――！？
description.pt-br:
Sato Itto, um assalariado comum, tem sido tímido em relação ao amor devido a um trauma antigo. Então, um dia, uma reunião é realizada pela primeira vez em vários anos. Enquanto eles se divertem conversando sobre os bons e velhos tempos, de repente Hebo, que se tornou uma Idol que está atualmente em hiato, decide participar da reunião!

Sato fica chateado ao ver Hebo, que foi seu primeiro amor. Ele consegue superar isso com a ajuda de álcool, que normalmente não bebe. Quando acorda, encontra os dois nus na mesma cama. Enquanto Sato tenta desesperadamente se lembrar de suas memórias, Hebo lhe diz, de forma chocante...!

“Se case comigo...”

O que acontecerá com o casamento entre os dois que não têm experiência com o amor...?

title.en: My New Girlfriend Is Not Human?

altTitles.de: Meine neue Freundin ist kein Mensch?

altTitles.fr: Ma Nouvelle Copine N'est Pas Humaine ?

altTitles.pt-br: Minha nova namorada não é humana?

altTitles.tr: Yeni kız arkadaşım insan değil mi?

altTitles.pl: Moja nowa dziewczyna nie jest człowiekiem?

altTitles.ja: キングダム

description.en:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
description.fr:
**Cette Histoire se déroule avant notre ère.**

La chine, qui n'est pas encore unifiée, traverse une grande guerre de cinq siècles. Shin, un jeune garçon contemporain de ces temps violents et houleux, cherche, par la seule force de son épée, à se faire un nom sous les cieux !!!
___
**Kingdom en France, le manga tant attendu ! Véritable phénomène au Japon !**
- Élu meilleur manga au 17e Grand Prix Culturel Osamu Tezuka (2013)
- Meilleur manga seinen vendu au Japon depuis 2015 (source : Oricon)
- 3ème meilleur manga vendu au Japon en 2016 et 2017 (source : Oricon)
description.uk: Мільйони років минуло з часів легенд, коли світ людей і богів був єдиним. У ті часи бажання людини верховодило над світом. Це була епоха 500-річної війни, період ворожих держав. «Королівство» — історія про хлопчину на ім’я Сінь, котрий прагне стати найвеличнішим генералом та про безліч випробувань та скитань, повз які пролягатиме його шлях до мети.
description.pt-br: Milhões de anos se passaram desde os tempos de lendas, quando os mundos dos homens e deuses ainda eram os mesmos. Nestes tempos eram os desejos do homem que mudaram o mundo. É o período da guerra de 500 anos: a Era dos Reinos Combatentes. Kingdom é a história de um garoto órfão e pobre tem o sonho de se tornar um grande general e assim começando seu caminho de provações e derramamento de sangue que o levarão até o topo das lendas!

altTitles.ja: 夢色パティシエール

description.en:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla… who knows what'll be possible?

altTitles.ja: 神の回廊

description.en:
One day, a girl woke up from a near car accident, and her name was Baek Nabi. After her chance encounter with a beautiful man, who saved her from the accident, Nabi starts to see things she has never seen before. Creatures who live off from human’s negative emotions are called ‘parasites’ . Nabi’s once normal life has overturned and becomes intertwined with several men all at the same time… “You’re a special existence. You just haven’t remembered yet.” A fantasy romance of Nabi and the mysterious beings around her.  


---

Official English translation by Comico's [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/208)

title.en: Dorei Shounin shika Sentakushi ga Nai desu yo? Harem? Nani Sore Oishii no?

altTitles.ja: Dorei Shounin Shika Sentakushi Ga Nai desu Yo? ~Harem? Nani sore oishii no?~

altTitles.en: Is The Only Option a Slave Merchant? ~ Harem? What is that, Is it tasty? ~

altTitles.ja: 奴隷商人しか選択肢がないですよ?～ハーレム?なにそれおいしいの?～

description.en:
Zeolith wanted a chill life, but when he turned 15 his villages rule was that they had to go to the vocational school "Velciel" where each student will choose their profession. Zeolith wanted an easy job where he could laze around all day, but the only options he got were : "The Highest Peak of the Human Race【Hero】", "The Strongest Ruler 【Demon Emperor】", "The Title of the Strongest Magician 【Great Sage】", "And the last one "The Lowest Title, a Job For Scum【Slave Merchant】". 

None of the titles were a good option. He picked the lowest title 【Slave Merchant】, which is inconspicuous among them and seems to be easy to live. But, He doesn't know it yet. 

It's the lowest occupation but it is the strongest for him and the most annoying-tiring ones. A harem struggle to be swayed by a variety of women, slutty alluring girls from elderly to younger ones who are his childhood friend's, the poisonous plantgirl, elves, cat ears adventurer, Loli Demon Lord, et cetera.  
  
This is Tale of The strongest【Slave Merchant】unwillingly makes a big success!
description.id:
Zeoris menginginkan kehidupan yang santai, tetapi ketika dia berusia 15 tahun, aturan desanya adalah bahwa mereka harus pergi ke sekolah keahlian “Velciel” di mana setiap siswa akan memilih profesi mereka. Zeoris menginginkan pekerjaan yang mudah di mana dia bisa bermalas-malasan sepanjang hari, tetapi satu-satunya pilihan yang dia dapatkan adalah: “Puncak Tertinggi dari Ras Manusia 【HERO】”, “Penguasa Terkuat 【Demon Emperor】”, “Gelar yang Terkuat Penyihir 【Great Sage】 “,” Dan yang terakhir “Tittle Terendah, Pekerjaan Untuk Sampah 【Slave Merchant】”. Tidak ada gelar yang merupakan pilihan bagus. Dia memilih gelar terendah 【Slave Merchant】, yang tidak mencolok di antara mereka dan tampaknya mudah untuk hidup.  
  
Tapi, dia belum mengetahuinya. Itu adalah pekerjaan paling rendah tetapi itu yang terkuat baginya dan yang paling melelahkan. Perjuangan harem untuk diombang-ambingkan oleh berbagai wanita, gadis cantik yang memikat dari tua hingga yang lebih muda yang merupakan teman masa kecilnya, gadis tumbuhan beracun, elf, petualang telinga kucing, Loli Demon Lord, dan lain-lain.  
  
Ini adalah Dongeng Terkuat 【Slave Merchant】 yang enggan membuat sukses besar!

altTitles.ja: まいわい
万祝

description.en:
Pirates like we see them in books or movies, do they really exist? 
Young Funako Yamato, martial art expert and daughter of a traditional fisherman will discover it against her will...
Everything begins when some strange fellows kidnap her and she ends in the middle of the ocean on a police-purchased boat. 
Katou, a mysterious character, is looking for a fabulous treasure hidden on a desert island...

altTitles.en: The Greatest Sect Leader of All-Time

description.en: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
description.fr: Ma quête est de développer une secte qui serait un foyer chaleureux pour ses membres. Dedans, non seulement le chef de secte est amusant (ouais c'est moi) mais les disciples sont excentriques, aux personnalités très variées. Ils ont comme particularités d'être en constante évolution et d'être anormalement forts. Tous se révèlent être des gros bonnets, et moi, leur patriarche, je deviendrai invincible ! Approchez, les enfants, rejoignez ma secte et ensemble nous réaliserons vos rêves !

altTitles.ja: みたきはら幼稚園まほう組

description.en: A light-hearted spin-off of Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica where Madoka, Homura, Sayaka and Kyoko attend a kindergarten operated by Kyubey with Mami as the teacher.
